body: I,m sorry ,I do not described clearly, when all clients are disconnected at the same time. the memory will back to the operating system slowly over time, after that the memory will grow to a high-level(higher memory than the client connection) a certain period of time, and hold the line, I see the memory by pprof,but find nothing for the odd memory. if the tcp server never access client, the memory will no change all time.
